pull.title: [0.21] wallet: Do not iterate a directory if having an error while accessing it
pull.body:
This change prevents infinite looping for, for example, system folders
on Windows.

Github-Pull: #21907
Rebased-From: 29c9e2c2d2015ade47ed4497926363dea3f9c59b

Note: Trivial backport, but in a differently-named function in another file

events.message:
wallet: Do not iterate a directory if having an error while accessing it

This change prevents infinite looping for, for example, system folders
on Windows.

Github-Pull: #21907
Rebased-From: 29c9e2c2d2015ade47ed4497926363dea3f9c59b

events.body: ACK 7b0b201d109b6240f114498fc1b94af9cb85f26e, I have reviewed the code and it looks OK, I agree it can be merged.
review ACK. Didn't test on Windows
